conclusion: In a v-t (velocity-time) graph, the slope of the tangent at any point represents the acceleration at that moment.
If the slope of the v-t graph changes sign (from positive to negative or vice versa), then the direction of the acceleration changes.

The slope of the graph for Car A is positive during the first arc (0 to 2 seconds) and negative during the second arc (2 to 4 seconds).
